article_title: Wal-Mart de Mexico Trims 2014 Store Expansion Plan
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—Latin America's largest retailer, Wal-Mart de Mexico, said Wednesday it has scaled back its expansion plans this year due to delays for store openings and amid a weak economy.

Walmex, as the unit of Wal-Mart Stores Inc. is known, has decided to push 15 store openings into January, bringing its annual openings to 149 stores, Chief Executive Scot Rank told investors at a conference.

As such, sales floor space will...
